Translations.Text: Soni nganitutulusya pa wandu wakwe panyuma pa jwalakwejo asilikali kuumila kwinani (wakwisa kwajonanga), soni nganikuwa kwakusosekwa Kukwetu kuti mpaka tutulusye (asilikali)
Nganikuwa (konanjidwa kwao) ikaweje ni n’gumiilo umpepe (uwagumisile Jibulilu), basi papopo waliji wakulita (wawile)
Ha! Yakudandaulisya kwa achikapolo (wa Allah)! Nganiwaichilileje ntenga jwalijose, ikaweje waliji nkuntenda chipongwe
Ana ngakulola (yanti) mikutula jilingwa jatujijonasile paujo pao? (Ana ngakulola) yanti wanganyao ngaakuujila kukwao
Soni pangali (iwumbe) iliyose ikaweje yosope yene ichiyika pameso Petu
Soni chilosyo (chachili) kwa wanganyao (chakulosya ukombosi wa Allah wakwajimusya wawe) ni litaka lyaliwe, tukasalisyusyaga, ni koposyamo songolo, basi sine mu syalakwesyo akasalyaga
Ni tukasawikaga mwalakwemo migunda ja mitende ni mizabibu, ni tukasapitisyaga soni mwalakwemo achitutumule
Kuti alyeje isogosi yakwe, kutendaga nganiyipanganyidwa ni makono gao, ana ngakutogolela
Kuswejela ni Kwakwe Ajula (Allah) jwagumbile chachilume ni chachikongwe mu indu yosope, kutandila yaikumesya litaka, ni mwa achimisyene wakweo (wandu), ni mu ichindu yangakuimanyilila
Soni chilosyo (chine chachili) kwa wanganyao (chakulosya ukombosi wa Allah) ni chilo, tukasawuwulaga mwalakwemo muusi, basi papopo wanganyao ni akasawaga m’chipi
Sano lyuwa likasajendaga mpaka pakutulalila pakwe. Walakweo ni mpango wa (Allah) Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwakumanyilila nnope
Nombe nao mwesi twaupimile mauto (makumi gawili kwisa nsano nagatatu), mpaka ukasaujaga kuwa mpela chikole cha tende chakalakala (chepindiche)
Nganiyiwa yakuwajilwa lyuwa kuwuyika mwesi, namuno chilo kuwulongolela muusi. Soni chilichose ching’ambila mwitala lyasyungulilo
Soni chilosyo (chine chachili) kwa wanganyao (chakulosya ukombosi wa Allah) ni chanti: Uwwe twajigele achatati wao m’chombo chepachile (cha ndawi ja Nuhu)
Ni twaguumbiile wanganyao (yombo) yakulandana mpela chalakwecho yaakukwela
Sano Uwwe naga tuli tusachile mpaka twamisye, ni pangali nkwakamuchisya wanganyao (jwampaka apikane gumila kwao), soni wanganyao ngawa nkokoledwa
Ikaweje kwa chanasa chakuuma Kukwetu, ni kusengwa kwa ndema jannono
Sano pati iwechetedwe kukwao yanti: “Jogopani yaili paujo penu ni yaili panyuma penu kuti ntendeledwe chanasa;” (ngakasapikana)
Ni changaichilila chilosyo chilichose mu ilosyo ya M’mbuje gwao (Allah), ikaweje wanganyao akasawaga wakuitundumalila yalakweyo

Soni pati iwechetedwe kukwao yanti: “Tolani mu yampele Allah.” Awala waakufuulu akasatiji pakwasalila (mwachipongwe) awala waakulupilile: “Ana twalisye awala wanti Allah angasache angalisyisye (Nsyene)? Nganim’ba jenumanja ikaweje mu kusokonechela kwakuonechela.”
Wanganyao ni akasatiji: “Ana chele chilanga (chakwika Kiyamachi) chiyiche chakachi nam’baga jenumanja nkuwecheta yakuona?”
Ngakwembecheya ikaweje n’gumilo umpepe (lipenga lyandanda) wauchakwembekanya (mwachisupuchisya) aku ali nkukangana
Basi ngasakombola kuleka wasiya, namuno kumawasa kwao ngasaujila
Ni lichigombedwa lipenga (lyawili), basi papopo wanganyao kuumila m’malembe tachikopokangana mwachitemachitema wa kwa M’mbuje gwao (Allah)
(Aku) achitiji: “Ipotesi yetuwe! Ana wani waatujimwisye pagona petu?” (Tachisalilidwa yanti): “Ayi ni ayila yajwapeleche chilanga (Allah) Jwaukoto wejinji ni kuwecheta mwakuona Achimitenga.”
Ngasiyiwa ikaweje n’gumilo umpepe, basi ajile sayi wosopewene tachisimanikwa kuti ayiche pameso Petu
(Ni tachisalilidwa yanti): “Basi lelo (lisiku lya Kiyama) ngatendedwa lupuso mundu jwalijose pa chilichose, soni ngan’dipidwa ikaweje yamwaliji nkupanganya.”
Chisimu wandu wa ku Mbepo lelo tawe mu shuguli (syao) achisengwaga
Wanganyao ni achiwammakwao tawe m’miwulili, ali ajegeme mu indanda yetandiche chenene
Akwete kupata wanganyao mwalakwemo isogosi (yantundu uliose), soni akwete kupata chilichose chaakuchisaka
(Tachisalilidwa yanti): “Salam (Ntendele uwe kwa jaomanja!)” – Lilowe lyakuumila kwa (Allah) M’mbuje Jwachanasa channope
Sano (wangalumbana ni tachisalilidwa kuti): “Litukusyani lelo jenumanja akulewa (ku wakulupilila)!”
